description: This file defines a data structure for representing a standard API error response, including details such as timestamp, status, error message, path, and validation violations. It contains a main record 'ApiError' and a nested record 'FieldViolation'.

classes.name: ApiError
classes.description: Data record representing a standard API error response with metadata and validation details.

classes.name: ApiError.FieldViolation
classes.description: Nested record representing a validation violation on a specific field.
